channel.title: Help with 508 server run.cmd
channel.description: i need some help with the 508+ server run.cmd every time i run it says "the system cannot find the path specified" how do i fix this?

item.title: Help with 508 server run.cmd
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

well if i recall (cause i dont use 508) run.bat has a long list in it make sure all are correct because if ones off they all off the simplest mistype will screaw it up

item.title: Help with 508 server run.cmd
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

[quote=“FusionLord, post:2, topic:256628”]lol i can tell you dont know much about private servers
no offense
ok right click on you .bat file and make sure you directories are forrect to find the right directory go to this directory

C:\Program Files\java[/quote] non taken im used to 317s and the earlier servers… 508s are all new to me, but the path is correct… still not sure whats going on
